00020 #include "core/peo_debug.h"

00022 
00023 template < class POT > class peoPSO : public Runner {
00024 
00025 public:
00026 
00027 
00028   // Constructor for the Particle Swarm Optimization
00029   peoPSO(
00030          eoContinue< POT >& __cont,
00031          peoPopEval< POT >& __pop_eval,
00032          eoVelocity < POT > &_velocity,
00033          eoFlight < POT > &_flight);
00034 
00035   // Particle Swarm Optimization function - a side effect of the fact that the class is derived from the Runner class
00036   // thus requiring the existence of a run function, the algorithm being executed on a distinct thread.
00037         void run();
00038         
00039   // Function operator for specifying the population to be associated with the algorithm.
00040         void operator()( eoPop< POT >& __pop );
00041 
00042 private:
00043 
00044         eoContinue< POT >& cont;
00045         peoPopEval< POT >& pop_eval;
00046         eoPop< POT >* pop;
00047         eoVelocity < POT > &velocity;
00048         eoFlight < POT > &flight;
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 template < class POT > peoPSO< POT > :: peoPSO( 
00053 
00054                                 eoContinue< POT >& __cont, 
00055                                 peoPopEval< POT >& __pop_eval, 
00056                                 eoVelocity < POT > &__velocity,
00057                                 eoFlight < POT > &__flight
00058                                 ) : cont( __cont ), pop_eval(__pop_eval ),velocity( __velocity),flight( __flight)
00059 {
00060         pop_eval.setOwner( *this );
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 template< class POT > void peoPSO< POT > :: operator ()( eoPop< POT >& __pop ) {
00065 
00066         pop = &__pop;
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 template< class POT > void peoPSO< POT > :: run() {
00071 
00072         printDebugMessage( "Performing the first evaluation of the population." );
00073         do {    
00074                 printDebugMessage( "Performing the velocity evaluation." );
00075                 velocity.apply ( *pop );
00076                 printDebugMessage( "Performing the flight." );
00077                 flight.apply ( *pop );
00078                 printDebugMessage( "Performing the evaluation." );
00079                 pop_eval(*pop);
00080                 velocity.updateNeighborhood( *pop );
00081         } while ( cont( *pop ) );
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 #endif
